website_summaries.verdict: A rich cream that feels nice on the skin and has a loyal following of repeat customers; however, it won't work for everyone and may be too harsh for some users.
pros: In addition to tea tree oil, this cream includes ingredients such as salicylic acid, St. John's Wort, and goldenseal to calm and soothe skin
Absorbs quickly and doesn't have a heavy or greasy feel on the skin
cons: Won't work for all acne breakouts and may cause some to worsen
Can sting a bit on individuals with sensitive skin

customer_reviews.title: I wanna cry it’s so good!
customer_reviews.text: I wanna cry!! I can’t even tell u how much this helped me! I use this and with benzoyl peroxide and a spin brush and it changed my life!!! I have always been looked upon for great skin but when I was hormonal and stressing coz of personal isssurs all his acne started occurring! I tried so many things. Nothing worked in fact it got worse. and I do have cystic acne.. my doc prescribed something and it still didn’t work so I have to give this a go and let me tell u.. I won’t go back!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Izzy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Stinky...but amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I have severe combination skin. My cheeks will look like an oil slick and my forehead will be peeling it's so dry. This product is a life saver! Fair warning it smells like a mosquito candle because of the tea tree oil, but it works. The 4 huge cystic acne zits I had 3 days ago are already dried up and healing! Usually takes them weeks to go away. Cheeks are not oily anymore and my forehead isn't peeling. I used this in combination with the face wash...also stinky. Update: it's been 2 months! AMAZING!!! 2nd photo is update
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: I love this moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: This is my first review and I had to make an exception. I love this moisturizer, and I had to share it. I have thick, oily Italian skin and a lot of times my skin regime dries my skin out very bad. This moisturizer softens my face without bringing my oil back. It’s really important to me to use natural products and I was skeptical at first, but I’m so happy I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like so many others have said
customer_reviews.text: Like so many others have said, this stuff really is amazing. I have skin that tends to be oily & acne prone. This helps clear up blemishes much faster and leaves the skin very soft. A little goes a long way. If you have oily skin, use a small amount daily; if you skin isn't super oily, you may want to use it less frequently than daily. I'm just careful to apply more lightly on areas that are a bit drier (mainly right between my eyebrows) than on the areas that are more oily, like my cheeks / chin. I really love it.
customer_reviews.author: Danja F.

customer_reviews.title: My son’s face is clearing up nicely and doesn’t look greasy or dirty
customer_reviews.text: This product is nothing what I expected! My son’s face is clearing up nicely and doesn’t look greasy or dirty. Much cheaper than the expensive products and prescriptions!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product works beautifully!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my teenage sister who is extremely prone to acne. She also struggles with sensitive skin and finds it difficult to find a good acne clearing product without irritating her skin. This product has made such a difference for her! The product is nice and light and does not have an overwhelming fragrance. It's nice and light and does not clog her pores. It has tremendously helped improve her acne and overall health of her skin. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Angie Stefanisin

customer_reviews.title: BEST ACNE LOTION I HAVE EVER COME IN CONTACT WITH
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE HAD ACNE FOR ** 47 YEARS ** THIS IS THE BEST ACNE CREAM I HAVE EVER GOT MY HANDS ON AND TRUST ME I HAVE TRIED EVERYTHING FROM PRESCRIPTIONS, DEPT. STORE BRANDS (CLINIQUE, etc.) ALL EXPENSIVE MAIL ORDER BRANDS, SALES LADY "STUFF", YOU NAME I'VE HAD IT & THIS HAS THE BEST INGREDIENTS MIXED TOGETHER. AT FIRST WHEN I PUT IT ON I WAS LIKE WHAT????? NEVER USED ANYTHING SO GOOPY BUT IT SOAKS IN AND THE NEXT MORNING YOUR SKIN FEELS GREAT AND IN 1 WEEK LOOKS COMPLETELY DIFFERENT. I LOVE IT AND HAVE NOT HAD A ZIT IN MONTHS & MONTHS!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Howerton

customer_reviews.title: Break out even more :(
customer_reviews.text: I am breaking out and very very itch after 2 used. I should have stick with the other one I always get, it’s more pricy but it actually worked. This product is cheaper by unfortunately it’s not working , I won’t buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Evie Lam

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This cream has evened out my skin tone, and is perfect weight for facial moisturizer. I have combination skin and this stuff is amazing. I read some reviews complaining about the scent, but I love tea tree scent. So happy I purchased
customer_reviews.author: leadnurse

customer_reviews.title: My new go-to face cream!
customer_reviews.text: I honestly like tea tree so it wouldn't bother me either way, but based on others' reviews, I was prepared for the scent to be a lot stronger. It's not that bad. With that said, I really do love this cream. It is thicker, but a little truly goes a long way so the jar does last a long time. I have sensitive, combination skin and I have not noticed it clogging my pores or making my skin greasy.
customer_reviews.author: L.A.Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for about a week and I already notice a difference. I use a small amount twice a day after I wash my face for my oily skin. The rosacea and acne on my cheeks has significantly dissipated and I enjoy the tea tree smell. This is exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: EZ

customer_reviews.title: Cleared my acne
customer_reviews.text: Cleared my breakouts!!! I hav Semi oily skin and nothing was working, this calms all my acne and makes my face matte and smooth. Highly recommend even for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.author: misdanielle

customer_reviews.title: Natural moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great natural moisturizer. It goes onto skin smoothly and leaves very little residue. Overall, it's not greasy. I found that using a moisturizer with my acne face wash keeps breakouts to a minimum and this one fits the bill as well. My only complaint is that the tea tree oil scent is very strong and smells medicinal. I think that adding some mint or eucalyptus oil is would help mellow out the scent a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love this so much and I was so excited to ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this so much and I was so excited to try it out but after the first time using it I knew my skin wasn’t loveing it. It started irritated and after the 3rd day of using it, my skin broke out so bad! The reason I bought this was I have really oily skin but I never break out. After seeing how bad my face was I stopped using it and my face is starting to clear up again. I’m so disappointed because I really this work for me
customer_reviews.author: Diana Montanez

customer_reviews.title: This is a terrible creame
customer_reviews.text: i bought this cream to help treat my acne. it has made my acne worse and it made my skin peel. I had really high hopes for this lotion but it just did not work for me. I waited to write this review because I thought my acne would get worse before it got better. This was not the case. The lotion is awful under make-up ( causes the make-up to separate). Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Juice

customer_reviews.title: It’s a thick formula so you need very little
customer_reviews.text: This is not a moisturizer it just stays on top of the skin. It’s very hard to distribute if you use a lot of product. I prefer to use this at night because it seals in my toner, serum, and acne cream. Products don’t work well on top of this face cream because it’s thick, so sunscreen, foundation.. just rub off. I give this product 3 stars because I’m not getting breakouts it’s just keeping my skincare in place. I recommend to use it at night but always check if you are allergic to it before putting it on your face. I also received the product that was advertised in a glass jar.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product so far
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance on this company, and it seems to be going pretty well. I did have a breakout yesterday, but I'm not sure if it's the introduction of this moisturizer that caused it. I'll come back and update this review once I've used it for a little longer. Thus far it does seem promising, however! It goes on smooth and doesn't feel heavy. I love how light it is on my skin! It also smells great, which is a bonus for any product you're literally rubbing on your face. All in all, I really do suggest it thus far!
customer_reviews.author: D.S.

customer_reviews.title: MY SKIN DOESNT EVEN FEEL LIKE SKIN! IT FEELS LIKE A SIDEWALK
customer_reviews.text: IT IRRITATED MY SKIN SO MUCH AND MADE IT RED AND BUMPY! I WAS LOOKING FORWARD FOR THIS AND CONSIDERING THE PRICE FOR A SMALL JAR, I HAD EXPECTATIONS BUT THIS IRRITATED ME AND I HAVE COMBO SKIN AND USUALLY PRODUCTS FOR OILY SKIN WORKS ON ME AND MAYBE OVER DRIES MY FACE A LITTLE BUT THIS PRODUCT MADE MY SKIN RED AND FLAKE A LOT LIKE NEVER BEFORE. I WANT A REFUND.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Clear skin
customer_reviews.text: The cream is thicker than I would like, I thought it would be more watery, thin but its creamy consistency. I hardly wear maekup so it's not a huge issue that its thicker than I like but for those who do where makeup you might want to read others reviews. Overall it does work to clear the skin. I have seen alot of improvement in blackheads, pimples, etc. My skin is looking nice for my 30's
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: Great for large pores/oily skin
customer_reviews.text: This is my second jar and I’m almost finished with it. I have large pores and oily skin. I’m still getting cystic acne in my 30’s. This stuff has improved my skin so much it’s unreal. I use it under my makeup and again after washing my face before bed.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Mayhem

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Okay so this is great for oily skin types as this did not moisturize or leave me heavier than I naturally am lol It has helped tremendously with my acne wich was very bad, and now has been reduced to minor, occasional flare ups. Only flaw is that if you dont continually use on a daily basis you WILL break out immediately, at least in my experience. But over I reccomend it for oily, acne prone skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Brown

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: Great face cream! My skin is so sensitive, I’m afraid of trying new products. But gave this cream a shot due to its natural ingredients. Very happy! No rush, very nice for my oily skin. If you have very oily skin and wake up in the morning all shiny, this cream is the way to go. No more shiny face in am. Love it Update two months later: After using the cream for a couple of months loving it. Ordering my third!
customer_reviews.author: AnaFrancis

customer_reviews.title: About to purchase my third container... IT'S AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff so much, seriously. I used to deal with big breakouts on an almost constant basis but I have been using this for over a year now and I have only had a pimple here and there maybe every three to four months. A little bit goes a long way so one purchase of this stuff goes a really long way. It is extremely moisturizing and all-natural. I use it every morning and every night. I have tried so many different products, including proactive and nothing I've used holds a candle to this stuff. As long as they keep making it, I'll keep buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way!
customer_reviews.text: I have terrible cystic acne, but my face is very very dry. If I add any moisterizer, I will break out the next day. IF YOU USE THIS CORRECTLY (small amount, use forefinger to rub into face) you will not break out! BUT, if you use a lot and rub it intensely in, you will break out. Yes there is coconut oil and yes its known to break people out, but the amount they put in should not harm your skin. I have never found a product that works as well as this. My face isn't dry and my skin feels hydrated :) You only need a dime sized amount!
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina René

customer_reviews.title: Did they change the formula?
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought this cream 4 or 5 times now. I do like how it moisturizes without being oily, and seems to keep my face from breaking out. However, with my last purchase, I’ve noticed my eyelids (and underneath my eyes) ha been getting very dry, to the point where my skin flakes off. I’m wondering if they changed anything in the formula? It doesn’t do it to the rest of my face, just my eye area. I used to love this cream, but now I’m having to search and see if I can find something that won’t irritate my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Ward

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Will always use time and time again
customer_reviews.text: Buying a second time! I absolutely love this product. I was having a really hard time with cystic acne on my chin and nothing was working. I was getting super insecure about it. I read up on this face cream and took the chance and boy, am I happy I did! It last soooo long because a little bit goes a long way. My skin honestly has never looked better! I put it on before bed every night and my skin has been great! So thankful for this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Y

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Works
customer_reviews.text: Really no scent. Feels really good on the skin. I have oily, acne prone skin, and I have seen a major improvement since starting to use this. I’m almost done with my second jar and intend to keep using this as my face cream. Have not had any cystic acne and the spots I do get are more under control. Doesn’t leave face feeling greasy. Would highly recommend to those with oily, acne prone skin. Only complaint is no spf, but I supplement that with other products. A little does go a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Depends on your skin
customer_reviews.text: Pretty strong smelling, has very natural ingredients which I love. I can’t tell if it helped my acne or not but I notice a tiny improvement. Does help with my oily skin but doesn’t help with dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: It smells like "Walter"
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so most of you have probably seen the commercial for pain cream in which the elderly woman tells the young athlete she smells just like her deceased, beloved husband Walter. Well, this cream smells like pain cream and I smelled like Walter. It was intensely strong and to put on your face at night was not pleasant. It reminded me of pain or foot cream. It was also VERY dry and very tacky. It did not feel good on my skin and was very thick and pasty. I'm sure for some people it work great but it was not my cup of tea (no pun intended).
customer_reviews.author: Conimarie

customer_reviews.title: Very luxurious!
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this product. The packaging is nice, and I love that it calls out being cruelty free and made in the US! It has an easy to read ingredients list. More importantly, the cream is really silky and does not leave a residue. It’s also not too drying, even though it has tea trees oil in it. Highly recommend to other people who suffer from occasional breakouts and are looking for a luxurious cream!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: omg
customer_reviews.text: My cousin recommended my this product and my gosh this has cleared up my cystic acne. Although I don't really like the thick feeling when you first apply it but after a few minutes your skin will absorb it and feel soft. I am so thankfully that this didn't clogged my pores. But every ingredient in this moisturizer aids in healing your skin. I use this day and night and I will continue to use this product to stay acne free. I have tried endless amounts of money on skincare, which you know is very expensive and something that is so affordable as this is mind bottling.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Not for everyone
customer_reviews.text: Like many other reviewer’s the first couple days of using this I loved it and then after that I noticed a bunch of tiny white heads cropping up all over my face and I got a pretty bad break out from this product. I think it comes down to not being able to tolerate one of the ingredients because some people do so well with it and other people don’t the breakout stopped when I discontinue use
customer_reviews.author: Hayley rose

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer but I had to add some Rose Hip Oil
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! The thing I really like is that it's not overly oily and it doesn't clog my pores. I actually had to add 2 syringes of Rose Hip Oil to make it a little more oily and moisturizing for my skin which I intensely dry out every night. This is the perfect amount of moisture for my skin and I love that it has Zinc since most sunscreens make me break out with very painful and swollen acne. Anyway, I would definitely recommend this to people with oily, dry, and/or sensitive skin for a good balance!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really love this cream as a night cream but it’s a ...
customer_reviews.text: I really love this cream as a night cream but it’s a bit thick and heavy for my combination skin during the day. Even in the winter I wouldn’t wear this under makeup. Possibly if you had very dry skin this would work for during the day. It works great as a night cream!
customer_reviews.author: LeeTop Contributor: Activewear

customer_reviews.title: Not for my skin
customer_reviews.text: I was really hesitant to try this product but I nevertheless bought it due to the amazing reviews. I used it for a couple of days & I have been breaking out like never before. By breakout, I don’t mean small zits, I’ve been getting huge cystic acne & I haven’t had that for so long. I’m so disappointed. Be CAREFUL, not for SENSITIVE skin. I think my skin is getting irritated by some of the ingredients such as coconut oil.
customer_reviews.author: Rinzindolma

customer_reviews.title: Really wanted to love it ...
customer_reviews.text: Tried this cream due to all the great reviews. Unfortunately it broke me out SO bad. I only ever have acne in my T-zone, but after using this I broke out on my cheeks! I also never EVER have cystic acne, but after a week of using this I had it all over my face! My skin is combo to oily (oily T-zone, dry cheeks) and I am of asian decent. I stopped using it for another week just to make sure it wasn't the product and I cleared up. I tried it again and the same cystic acne appeared again. It didn't work for me, but if you want to take a chance - go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Penelope

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer for treating acne prone areas.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great moisturizer for acne prone areas of skin. I only use it on my nose...not the rest of my face where I want more moisturizer. This seems to be reducing my black heads on my nose.
customer_reviews.author: knoxvolgal

customer_reviews.title: nice lotion
customer_reviews.text: I have very oily combination skin. My T zone gets very oily but my cheeks/chin area can get very dry and flakey-especially in winter. I also get breakouts-usually just 1-4 red, raised pimples at a time. I was really hoping this would help minimize redness from the pimples and hydrate my dry skin without being too oily. It's very thick but spreads fairly well and absorbs into the skin pretty well. My T zone still got oily but it didn't seem as bad as usual. Didn't seem to do much for my breakouts but, still a nice moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Rach

customer_reviews.title: Might work for others
customer_reviews.text: This product did no wonders for me. I kept breaking-out with small red pimples after 4 days of use. I did like that the cream is non-oily and penetrates quickly. I really had high hopes that this cream had worked for me. Maybe it will do better on someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Juan F. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Maybe my skin is TOO sensitive...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product based on reviews and also figured the tea tree oil would reduce breakouts. This product definitely caused more pimples for me. I used for a few days then quit. Last night, I found this product in my medicine cabinet and decided to give it another try. Guess what? Two new fat pimples today. I give up. Cant even get a refund at this point...
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Great for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: I bought this around winter time when my skin start to feel really dry and I was hesitant at first because I have oily skin and didn’t want to add something else onto my already oily face and start to breakout. But that wasn’t the case I would apply it every morning before heading out to work and it wouldn’t leave my skin feeling extra oily if anything my skin softer and smoother and it seemed to take care of some of my acne scaring. It is now summer time and I have stopped using it but during the winter time this product is a must for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kev137

customer_reviews.title: Non greasy face moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I am really picky about what goes on my face. I have acne prone, oily skin and so far I love this product because it's easily rubbed in and I don't break out with it. It is my second ordering it and I still love it. It has a very faint smell to it, mostly of the tea tree, but it doesn't linger. I will continue to order.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Weird smell, very drying - not what I'd want for a moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: It feels like the product I got was different from the one the other reviewers got. I have oily/combination skin, sensitive, rosacia. The fragrance is more than I'm used to in moisturizers and not good, but not bad. Faintly tea tree. I'm not sure this does much. It left my skin feeling very dry and looking red. The cleanser of the same brand I tried separately (it smelled like plastic and onion, did OK but the plastic smell was overwhelming). The smell on the moisturizer is tolerable but I wouldn't buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Dex

customer_reviews.title: Cystic acne!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I have cystic hormonal acne and have been using this for almost a month now. I’m already see a difference! I use even use this after my glycolic acid peels that I do occasionally. It’s so calming! Not greasy ! LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this product given so many positive reviews, but for me it is just okay. I have combination skin and live in a dry climate, and this moisturizer provides just enough moisture. It is quite light so I would not recommend it for someone with very dry skin. In terms of helping with acne and discoloration, it definitely did not make my skin worse, but I have been using it for a few months and haven't noticed any significant improvement. I still get occasional breakouts and consequent dark marks. Overall, I think it is a nice moisturizer and I enjoy the light tea tree scent.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Rich but Matte - Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This face lotion is legit. The tea tree oil and jojoba and whatever else are great and keep my skin tamed, but what I think I like MOST is that it has a really rich creamy feeling but as it absorbs in my skin it doesn't make me shiny. My issue is that I usually get shiny in my T-zone and a lot of lotions just escalate that. This keeps my skin matte and fresh without feeling drying at all. I really really like it and will definitely buy it again (but I won't need to anytime soon because it's so thick you only need a little bit to cover your whole face and neck!).
customer_reviews.author: Danine Pontarelli

customer_reviews.title: Horrible reaction!
customer_reviews.text: Omg ... I don’t know why but literally the very first time I used it, it started out super positive! It wasn’t greasy and it was really lightweight but left my skin moisturized. Then within 3-4 hours I broke out with 4 huge pimples where I put the cream! I very rarely get pimples (I got this due to blackheads and oily skin) much less do I get 2 at one time and DONT get 3! This was literally the only thing I used that was different and again - right where I applied it! So my skin didn’t respond well to it at all unfortunately
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Alford

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a moisturizer that works!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many different face creams, due to oily skin. I just turned 30, but never had a problem with skin before (it's getting worse as I get older)! This face cream does NOT make my skin oily. It soaks in within minutes and almost has a dry feeling. I can't say it helps with acne for me, but it does not make my face shiny or oily. I couldn't ask for much more. A big plus is that it is made locally, right here in Florida. LOVE THE USA! I will be purchasing again. Oh, and one tip: a little goes a long way!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it came broken
customer_reviews.text: one jar came broken jar, and tiny pieces inside the cream. I would like to receive the money backfor one jar
customer_reviews.author: Sara Huizar

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t clear up my skin after months but I still love it
customer_reviews.text: So please trust me when I say I have dealt with cystic hormonal acne for most of my life. I’ve been on multiple medications and supplements and nothing helps. This lotion included. BUT I LOVE IT! Just as a moisturizing sensitive lotion! It hasn’t helped my redness or acne one bit but I love the way it feels on my face and I love knowing it has clean ingredients vs. store lotions. I don’t know if it works better for people who have surface acne or not but for me it’s a great lotion it just didn’t clear up my skin any.
customer_reviews.author: Tiaonna

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced nonsense
customer_reviews.text: This cream is not well crafted. It leaves a grey residue (even when used sparingly and rubbed in vigorously on completely cleaned skin) and doesn't feel like it absorbs properly. I have more blackheads then before, and it may be because this cream is blocking my pores. I wanted a more natural cream, and would have been willing to pay the extra bucks for a good one. This one is not worth it, spend your money somewhere else!
customer_reviews.author: BCurtains

customer_reviews.title: Helped with my trouble zone
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this face cream to help with my trouble area which is around my mouth and chin. I needed something that works but is also gentle and moisturizing. Most products tend to over dry this area leading to peeling and sensitivity. This face cream has done a good job. After only a few nights I saw an improvement around my mouth without the skin feeling too tight. The jar also come s very well sealed. There is a plastic outer layer and an inside seal so that you know it's safe. I'm overall super happy with this face cream and really glad I found it. I would recommend it to anyone with lingering blemishes. Good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Moore

customer_reviews.title: Rosacea cream
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a while back and have waited until i had a good idea if this worked or not! I am pleased to say this is pretty awesome stuff. I have had some Rosacea on my cheeks, nose, upper lip. Its not bad as I've seen other pics of peoples since i had no idea what it was when this started. I tried numerous face creams and they just annoyed it and no difference save for this stuff! Yay! I am in my 50's and never had skin problems during my teens or adulthood but now i have some and this cream is great! thank you!
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: fast result
customer_reviews.text: use together with the tea tree face wash. I very much love this brand. every product is organic plant extracts. no grease feeling at all, so I can apply proper amount on my face. the skin absorb it fast. no grease and no residue. I highly recommend this if you really get bothered by oily skin in summer. my face has the greasy looking pretty much after 1 or 2 hours in the morning after I get out of the house. hotter temperature makes it worse. this cream delayed that process. you might still got a oily face end of the day but the total amount of oil generated during the day is definitely less.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona

customer_reviews.title: It has sunscreen in it too which is so great! Feels amazing, try it out for sure:)
customer_reviews.text: Little to no scent, feels amazing on the skin. I've been using it with the matching cleanser and exfoliator and it's honestly made me skin look incredible. I really love it and will continue buying it if I can afford it. You 100% get what you pay for. Slowly over the past 2 weeks I have been using it, I have seen my ance and pimples decrease dramatically and my skin just looks so glowy. I haven't put foundation or concealer on in about a week and a half because my skin looked that good! I definitely would recommend to a friend👍
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Waxy film on skin
customer_reviews.text: The lotion is very thick and doesn't absorb into skin well at all. Even hours after applying, if I rub my skin I get a waxy residue that is just kind of gross. The chunks in the picture are little rolls of waxy build up that happened when I rubbed my cheek 45 mintues after I applied this lotion. For reference, I do not wear makeup, and applied only lotion to my face after showering. I used a smaller amount than recommended in the label. I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Becky_821

customer_reviews.title: Worked for Me on Light Complexion, Combo Skin with Oily T-zone 49 yoa
customer_reviews.text: I really like this moisturizer. It is creamy and substantial but it is not greasy AT. ALL. It immediatedly absorbs into my skin. It has not completely cleared my acne flare ups ( that I am still getting at age 49 which is super infuriating) but it has helped tremendously with keeping the oil down in teh t-zone and breakouts have reduced. It smells like tea tree oil smells. No surprises there. I don't find that scent unpleasant but some may.
customer_reviews.author: L. Beach

customer_reviews.title: Fast improvement of hormonal cystic acne!
customer_reviews.text: Great improvement within 3 days! I haven't had any new flareups and the cystic acne I already had is healing quickly. Even old scars seem to be healing faster. So happy with this cream and the face wash!
customer_reviews.author: MommyMary

customer_reviews.title: The worst moisturizer I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to give it a try, since my usual daily moisturizer is $25 more expensive than this and I was looking to see if I could save some money if I found something else I liked. This turned out to be the worst moisturizer I've used. It feels extremely greasy when I put it on, and it doesn't absorb into my skin well at all. I really had to rub it into my face to get the white residue to go away. Despite feeling greasy on first application, my skin felt dried out and tight within an hour. On top of that, it broke me out overnight with whiteheads. I'm throwing this garbage out.
customer_reviews.author: Jen S

customer_reviews.title: I am a guy and love it!
customer_reviews.text: I typically use neutrogena face lotion after I shave. My face is sensitive to oily lotions and require non pore clogging lotion. This Tea Tree Oil Face Cream is great, non oily, very hydrating, and tightens the skin. I have never really cared about limiting wrinkles, but am 45 now and noticing them a little. I don't care to have a full skin care system, I just want to put lotion on after I shave or shower and go. This product is really great for cooling my face after a shave and it makes me look a little younger. Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Karl

customer_reviews.title: Good for the very sensitive
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on a whim for my niece who has acne and has tried all kinds of prescription, OTC and "advertised on TV" skin care....when she asked me to reorder it for her, I knew it was helping her skin without burning or drying it out. Good for the very sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: Terri C

customer_reviews.title: Great for oily face!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this face cream because it doesn't leave your skin looking oily. I'm someone who likes to scrub my face squeaky clean and after putting this on i know my face is well moisturized. I did break out about 3 times but i feel like it's because i had some unclogged pores. A little really goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Snoopy

customer_reviews.title: Good Moisturizer, that's about all
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this product, though it did not help with my current issue. I have never really broken out until lately, and I have been applying this lotion or cream on every morning and night. I have not seen a difference just that my forehead is shiny by the end of the day. I don't normally have oily skin, but with this I feel like I do. Three stars for it smelling good and it does moisture better than some of my other face lotions. Container is quite small as well. I have had better luck with my pimple issue by using apple cider and Aloe. I will continue to use this product as a moisturizer though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Miracle in a jar!
customer_reviews.text: It worked miracles for my sensitive cystic acne prone skin. My skin is oily and my acne was persistent. Almost everything broke me out, I thought it was hopeless. Then I discovered this product and it was truly God sent. It cleared my face up in about a month and I don’t have any active acne on my face now. I’m on my 3rd jar now and I’ll keep repurchasing. Highly recommended for oily skin and cystic acne. I apply the cream after I use the Maritimes Essential 20% vitamin C+hyaluronic acid+vitamin e serum, which I also purchased from amazon. And, I love how this cream is cruelty free. Makes me love it even more!
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Please read, not for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product but there is a couple of things you need to keep in mind. First of all you need to ease your skin into this cream because of the tea tree oil, don't use it everyday and start working your way up. Do not, I repeat do not put this close to your eyes, I made that mistake and I irritated my eyelids and lips 😞 I do not recommend for sensitive skin. It is a game changer but be smart about it.
customer_reviews.author: Mavigo

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for those with acne prone skin. I use it for my neck and my chest and it really helps. I have another product for my face so I try not to mix the two. I would definitely recommend you to try it if you have oily skin.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Ugh, makes my face break out!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to help clear up my face, but it actually gives me more breakouts! And makes my pimples redder too. Definitely not a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Marina C.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely satisfied! This product is amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely satisfied! Love this cream, I waited a couple weeks to post to see if I had results and I have to say I'm shocked! My self and my teenage daughter use this cream only now besides soap to wash. It is soft, smooth, literally all you need is a small amount, and the smell is minimal but soothing. I have seen her face and mine clear up dramatically without all the crusty dry skin crap that comes with it. I will be purchasing this product regularly and I have referred to many.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Nicola

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: This product is actually really good. When I was reading the reviews for this product I was really happy with what I found. Then I read the 1 star reviews about how some people got different things. One of the reviews said that the one that worked for them had 19 ingredients while the other one they got had 24 ingredients and it didnt work. I checked mine and so I feel lucky. I tried some and it was so fast. Like I checked a few minutes later and it worked so well. My acne was going away. I might even buy one for my sister for christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Great for adult acne.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve spent years looking for a moisturizer to contain the oil on my face. Now that I’m working in a mask nine hours a day this stuff is a godsend. Before using this my face would have to be blotted multiple times a day and would be a constant oil slick. Now my oils are substantially less in my skin is looking so much better after just a few days every use. Great for women in their 30s still battling acne.
customer_reviews.author: Illdoyohair

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend if you have problem acne.
customer_reviews.text: I finally had my hormonal acne under control until I tried this moisturizer. Now my face is broke out all over again. I used it only 2 times and I am now on day 8 since I've used it and am having a very hard time getting my acne under control again. Wasted my money big time.
customer_reviews.author: Samanthah

customer_reviews.title: Goes on smoothly, doesn't feel heavy or greasy
customer_reviews.text: This smells really nice and refreshing, and goes on really nicely. Some moisturizers feel heavy or oily, etc., but this one is very light and a few minutes after you put it on, it doesn't feel like you're wearing anything on your face. I have oily skin so some moisturizers make me feel even oilier, but not this one. I do get acne but after taking vitamins and using witch hazel I have seen a reduction in acne, so I'm not sure if this moisturizer has directly helped with acne at all, but it certainly doesn't cause breakouts and it probably does help with acne.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love how it makes my face feel!
customer_reviews.text: The face cream makes my face feel dry sometimes. This DEFINITELY works to reduce redness. I had visible results after a week. The only negative thing would be the smell. If you can get past it, you’ll love this cream. I am definitely buying this again! **UPDATE** I’ve been using this for a few months now, and had to lower the rating. This definitely makes my face break out if I stop using it even for a day. It’s too late to return :/ or exchange for the Soothe one (that doesn’t make my face break out)
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Gomez

customer_reviews.title: No for me
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately as much as I wanted to love this product for it's organic ingredients, it was not for me. I have oily acne prone skin and was in need or a moisturizer that did not clog my pores. This product did nothing for my skin.
customer_reviews.author: whitcamp

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I really wish I would have taken before and after pictures of my face for this review but I forgot. I have oily skin and horrible acne. Also, I have psoriasis which makes it very difficult to use anything in fear I'll have a psoriasis break out! This face moisture is the answer to your prayers!!! I use this day, night and under my make up! It has cleared up almost all of my breakouts. Also, when I use under my makeup it helps control the oil!
customer_reviews.author: Dixie

customer_reviews.title: Finally my forever moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I use the cleanser of the same brand and noticed a definite improvement in my skin so tried this as well. I am 47 and have battled breakouts since I was a teenager. Nothing earth shattering but I pretty much always had 1-3 pimples at any given time. This feels so nice on my skin and I have hardly had a pimple at all since I started using it. I wish I found this sooner. I recommend using with the tea tree cleanser. Love , love love!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn A. Snow

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been getting this exact product for about a year, and then this last bottle came and is NOT the same. I had a massive allergic reaction around my eyes and eyelids. Do not to purchase!! Not the real stuff
customer_reviews.author: Josh & Lyndie Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Be wary.
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten this in the past, but I just received it today and found that there was an...orange substance in it? I know you can't entirely see the color difference, but there's a discoloration when it's supposed to be white. It has a chemical-like smell to it, nothing like the first time I purchased it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Magic Face Cream !!!!!!!! IN LOVE
customer_reviews.text: This is my third time ordering I love the way my skin feels with this plump, hydrated and I definetly do see a big difference on my skin with acne. My skin has never felt better, I have also recommend this to friends and family they love it as well. I am in my 20s and I have oily skin especially in the summer I drink lots of water and I do wash my face day and night with skin products I use this and eye cream and my skin feels amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: 4angeles

customer_reviews.title: Try It!
customer_reviews.text: I have battled acne again now in my late 20s. I think my skin was reacting to all the petroleum based products in the common skincare today. I switched to this moisturizer and now a week later, I have no zits and my scars from previous breakouts are fading too. I use this in conjunction with an all natural charcoal facial soap and the toner this brand also sells.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Gross.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived with some gross brown stuff stuck around the cap screw. It made me feel extremely uncomfortable to put this on my face if this is the condition it arrived in. I will be returning. I hope this is a one time mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to like it...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Cruelty free, vegan Cons: It's supposed to be for sensitive skin, but it made my face worse. Luckily I only tried it on a tiny swatch of skin, but it still burns from where I out it on. It's got coconut oil, so it's HEAVY. It was like trying to put on straight up butter. Didn't really blend in well, just sort of sat on my face for a while. Maybe it might work for someone else, but sadly it didn't jive with my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah G.

customer_reviews.title: Clear skin in 3 days!
customer_reviews.text: Miracle in a bottle! I have had acne for 40 years and I finally gave up 20 years ago when Proactive did not work. My 13 yr old needed something to get him thru puberty breakouts and so I tried this for him. Not only does it help his blemishes, but I tried it 3 nights ago and my face is clearer than it has been in 30 years!! I am 53 and I am so happy i do not have to deal with teenage skin anymore! Thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Methvin

customer_reviews.title: Broke me out
customer_reviews.text: I had cystic acne for years. I ended up going to the dermatologist and getting medicine. So I had fine skin before using this product. I would get the occasional cyst and saw the amazing reviews about how much it cleared cystic acne. I have not gotten a cyst since using this but the amount of whiteheads I've gotten since starting this product has been insane. It definitely broke me out. I have sensitive oily skin and everyone said this would work wonders. Not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Szuecs

customer_reviews.title: Very Moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: The ingredients in this product are all natural and so replenishing. I recently began using this product and already see improvements in my skin. I highly recommend this product to anybody looking to have balanced facial skin.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Next Level Acne Moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Listen up people. This moisturizer is one of the best if not the best moisturizer I have ever tried. The tea tree oil helps eliminate acne while the rest of the ingredients like aloe vera and pomegranate seed leave your skin super healthy and moisturized. I have moderate acne and very sensitive skin. This product is thick but melts into my skin within minutes leaving absolutely zero residue. No greasy oily aftermath. Just beautiful healthy skin!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Wow wow wow!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have NEVER found a product that works for me quite like this one. My face is so darn dry BUT EXTREMELY OILY. My under eyes flake and my t zone drowns in oil trying to moisturize itself. I have mild acne and sensitive eczema prone skin. After reading all these positive reviews, I decided to give it a shot. The FIRST day I try this bad boy out I immediately saw a difference. Less oil production and my face feels moisturized with absolutely no irritation. I’ve also bought the tea tree oil cleanser and this is the pair you need. If you have oily dehydrated sensitive skin, THIS IS FOR YOU!!
customer_reviews.author: Rasilva

customer_reviews.title: Better than Doctor prescribed moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed by how soon I saw the results! I have extremely oily skin, acne and red all over. I used probably every product out there and even went on accutane! Yes accutane worked but I was still having extremely oily skin, but the acne went away. This product works almost instantly, at least for me! By the first week everyone noticed my skin tone was a very light pink instead of a tomato red and my oily skin isn’t so oily as before...this is just 1 week using it! I will ALWAYS purchase this item!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: THIS. My skin is acne prone, combo skin at it's finest. Like many of you, I've spent oodles of money on different products only to have oily, overly dry or irritated acne strewn skin. This product cleared my skin up within about a week. It isn't heavy or greasy, it feels great and absorbs evenly. I personally enjoy the tea tree scent which apparently bothers some people as it's fairly "earthy" but the scent is light and dissipates quickly. A little goes a long way so don't fret the size. I definitely recommend a try!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rosasea Sufferer.... This worked for Me!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have rosacea that causes my skin to flake. Quite unattractive. I've tried numerous products, but decided to try this cream and the wash. The week I started this, I had had a terrible flare up. It was also a very stressful week which I am told can cause rosacea to flare up. That week I washed twice a day with the wash. I took the cream to work, and about every two hours I applied a light coat. In three days, the flaking was gone, and currently my skin looks great. I hope I don't jinx myself, but this worked for me, and I've tried a lot of products.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Pinder

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing and gentle
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cream to use in the winter on my forehead, which gets really dried out. I was really looking for something that would help moisturize, but not cover my face in acne, and this really does the trick. The cream is thick, but doesn't leave your face feeling sticky afterwards. I put it on every morning after I get out of the shower, and then I usually put it on again right before bed time. It has a very subtle & gentle scent, that doesn't overpower you. It's great for delicate skin and provides a lot of moisture.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: I really love this product
customer_reviews.text: I really love this product. I have always had oily skin and nothing would get it under control and this definitely helps. A little goes a long way! So much better than all the other products that I have tried that are 70, to 100 $. It is a little sticky and heavy at first but once it soaks in it is comfortable and does not bother me. That being said... I will take two minutes of slightly sticky over nasty chemicals. I'm so happy that this has ingredients that I can read. I also live in New Orleans where it is very humid so I am sure that is a factor. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee

customer_reviews.title: Love(d) this lotion, but bad packaging switch!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this lotion for probably about a year now and absolutely LOVE it! It's organic, not heavy or greasy at all, my skin has been clear, and it keeps my skin well hydrated. I originally chose it because it was organic AND came in a plastic-free container! A glass jar with metal lid. I recently re-ordered and was super bummed when my favorite lotion came in a plastic tub, wrapped in more plastic on the outside. So unnecessary. You make a great lotion! Now it's filled with the chemical soup of its plastic container. I will no longer be purchasing and am truly bummed about it.
customer_reviews.author: Nora

customer_reviews.title: Didn't help my hormonal acne
customer_reviews.text: I always appreciate when someone leaves honest feedback so I try to do similar. I tried this for about a week and half, but it made me break out and get a rash on my cheeks. I had to return it because it was just making my face worse. I'm now breaking out like crazy since I started using it.
customer_reviews.author: Girl from Jersey

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t help with oil
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive, oily, acne prone skin. I like this moisturizer so far. It is non irritating and my skin has cleared up nicely since using it. I only gave it 4 stars because it doesn’t really help with my oily skin. It does have a tea tree smell but I don’t find the smell to be lingering. It goes away after a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: smells great, has a light tingly sensation when applied
customer_reviews.text: I use this cream with tea tree cleanser from the same line. The cream is sensational, goes on smoothly, smells great, has a light tingly sensation when applied. Makes skin feel hydrated and refreshed, and most importantly it controls acne outbreaks. I have been using it for about a month and love it.
customer_reviews.author: mittencat

customer_reviews.title: Made breakout even worse
customer_reviews.text: I have oily dehydrated skin - so I was hoping this would be the perfect combo of heavy moisturizing properties without clogging my pores. I tried this for three weeks and it made my skin worse. I am now using the Hydro Boost Water Gel from Neutrogena and that is great, has not made my acne worse but hydrates my skin perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Feels great and is reducing cystic acne.
customer_reviews.text: Feels and smells great. Love that it's natural and I'm not putting tons of chemicals on my face. Leaves a minty tingle feeling which let's me know it's working to penetrate my pores. Has reduced my cystic acne by about 90%.
customer_reviews.author: sean cordi

customer_reviews.title: Works good for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin, acne prone and it's dry and oily. My skin is not easy to deal with. I use a small amount, so that my face doesn't get too oily. I have been using it for about a month, and So far is has not made my skin breakout which happens often with moisturizers, it actually helps with clearing up pimples. It definitely helps the dryness too. I'm happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Alberto J. Santos

customer_reviews.title: Super great!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cream! I actually think it managed to get rid of a small mole growing under my eye. It has a light eucalyptus smell but it doesn't last long to where you smell it forever. I usually wash my face with Halo volcanic ash soap and then finish my face with this cream. This small jar has lasted me about 5 months! It also doesn't leave my skin feeling greasy. I hace naturally oily skin so this stuff works perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley E.

product_meta.title: Tea Tree Oil Face Cream - For Oily, Acne Prone Skin Care Natural & Organic Facial Moisturizer with 7X Ingredients For Rosacea, Cystic Acne, Blackheads & Redness 2oz Era-Organics
feature_bullets: Using tea tree oil for acne is a centuries old natural remedy that still works today. Our face moisturizer for oily skin is perfect for blemishes, blackheads, cystic acne, redness and combination skin. Get balanced, smoother & clearer skin!

Extra Strength Nourishing Formula- Most acne treatments are too harsh on the skin, leading to irritation, redness or dry skin. Our facial cream is formulated to soothe, nourish and hydrate oily skin, dry skin or combination skin. Gentle facial moisturizer perfect for men, women and teens!

Ingredients Your Skin Will Love. We combine powerful natural and organic ingredients to nourish and balance the skin, including: St. John’s Wort, Pomegranate Seed Oil, Salicylic Acid, Zinc, Burdock Root, Dandelion Root & Goldenseal.

As Safe as It Is Effective. Our natural face cream is non comedogenic, cruelty free and vegan friendly. To make sure people with sensitive skin can use it, it’s also paraben free, non-toxic, no hormone disruptors and gentle – yet effective.
Buy With Confidence - Era Organics is family owned and operated so customer service and satisfaction are our top priority!
